ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragons (was: The Hole is now live... (Patch messag e)
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder if the coding they have that prevents spells from working on higher level mobs was somehow used here.  Just a thought, but it would be nice of them if
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder if the coding they have that prevents spells from working on higher
level mobs was somehow used here. Just a thought, but it would be nice of
them if a weaker dragon simply dodged everything a 53+ player
swung/cast/throw at them. Kinda takes away from role-playing if you can
kill a tougher dragon, but get death touched by a weaker one.

But there I go again using the R-P word. I might get banned for this if I
keep it up. ;^)

Peace
Evulia, twinked out and still stalled at 11, Tunare
